The three knowledges achieved by the Bud: Knowledge of the death and rebirth of sentient beings
Knowledge of the ending of defilements
Knowledge of the cessation of rebirth
The defilements (a repetitive sentence s: Corruptions that lead to future lives
Corruptions that result in suffering and future rebirth, old age, and death
